replies.bodyText: Hi @pdurbin, we added both ways (query and path), just as the create() function is implemented for both currently. The docs at http://guides.dataverse.org/en/latest/api/native-api.html#assign-default-role-to-user-creating-a-dataset-in-a-dataverse seem to omit the path variant completely, which is why we left it out as well.
